data.prayer: Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Apurímac, Peru.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Apurímac, Peru
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the state of Apurímac.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 6 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Apurímac, Peru to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.

data.prayer: Father, you desire the people in the state of Apurímac who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Asheninka, Ucayali-Yurua people.
Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the state of Apurímac.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Father, let the threatened of Apurímac, Peru know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.

data.prayer: Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Apurímac, Peru so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.
